detectors.description: Halo3D.isContract(address) (vulnerable1.sol#216-220) is declared view but contains assembly code
detectors.markdown: [Halo3D.isContract(address)](vulnerable1.sol#L216-L220) is declared view but contains assembly code

detectors.description:
Halo3D.tokensToEthereum_(uint256) (vulnerable1.sol#441-461) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- _etherReceived = (SafeMath.sub((((tokenPriceInitial_ + (tokenPriceIncremental_ * (_tokenSupply / 1e18))) - tokenPriceIncremental_) * (tokens_ - 1e18)),(tokenPriceIncremental_ * ((tokens_ ** 2 - tokens_) / 1e18)) / 2) / 1e18) (vulnerable1.sol#448-459)
detectors.markdown:
[Halo3D.tokensToEthereum_(uint256)](vulnerable1.sol#L441-L461) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [_etherReceived = (SafeMath.sub((((tokenPriceInitial_ + (tokenPriceIncremental_ * (_tokenSupply / 1e18))) - tokenPriceIncremental_) * (tokens_ - 1e18)),(tokenPriceIncremental_ * ((tokens_ ** 2 - tokens_) / 1e18)) / 2) / 1e18)](vulnerable1.sol#L448-L459)

detectors.description:
Halo3D.sell(uint256) (vulnerable1.sol#170-190) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- _dividends = SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(_ethereum,dividendFee_),100) (vulnerable1.sol#178)
	- profitPerShare_ = SafeMath.add(profitPerShare_,(_dividends * magnitude) / tokenSupply_) (vulnerable1.sol#187)
detectors.markdown:
[Halo3D.sell(uint256)](vulnerable1.sol#L170-L190) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [_dividends = SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(_ethereum,dividendFee_),100)](vulnerable1.sol#L178)
	- [profitPerShare_ = SafeMath.add(profitPerShare_,(_dividends * magnitude) / tokenSupply_)](vulnerable1.sol#L187)

detectors.description:
Halo3D.purchaseTokens(uint256,address) (vulnerable1.sol#377-413) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- _fee = _fee - (_fee - (_amountOfTokens * (_dividends * magnitude / (tokenSupply_)))) (vulnerable1.sol#404)
detectors.markdown:
[Halo3D.purchaseTokens(uint256,address)](vulnerable1.sol#L377-L413) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [_fee = _fee - (_fee - (_amountOfTokens * (_dividends * magnitude / (tokenSupply_))))](vulnerable1.sol#L404)

detectors.description:
Version constraint ^0.4.21 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.21 (vulnerable1.sol#1)

	- _customerAddress.transfer(_dividends) (vulnerable1.sol#167)

	- onWithdraw(_customerAddress,_dividends) (vulnerable1.sol#168)

	External calls:

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Halo3D.transfer(address,uint256) (vulnerable1.sol#191-205):
	External calls:
	- withdraw() (vulnerable1.sol#198)
		- _customerAddress.transfer(_dividends) (vulnerable1.sol#167)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payoutsTo_[_customerAddress] -= int256(profitPerShare_ * _amountOfTokens) (vulnerable1.sol#201)
	- payoutsTo_[_toAddress] += int256(profitPerShare_ * _amountOfTokens) (vulnerable1.sol#202)
	- tokenBalanceLedger_[_customerAddress] = SafeMath.sub(tokenBalanceLedger_[_customerAddress],_amountOfTokens) (vulnerable1.sol#199)
	- tokenBalanceLedger_[_toAddress] = SafeMath.add(tokenBalanceLedger_[_toAddress],_amountOfTokens) (vulnerable1.sol#200)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(_customerAddress,_toAddress,_amountOfTokens) (vulnerable1.sol#203)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Halo3D.transfer(address,uint256)](vulnerable1.sol#L191-L205):
	External calls:
	- [withdraw()](vulnerable1.sol#L198)
		- [_customerAddress.transfer(_dividends)](vulnerable1.sol#L167)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [payoutsTo_[_customerAddress] -= int256(profitPerShare_ * _amountOfTokens)](vulnerable1.sol#L201)
	- [payoutsTo_[_toAddress] += int256(profitPerShare_ * _amountOfTokens)](vulnerable1.sol#L202)
	- [tokenBalanceLedger_[_customerAddress] = SafeMath.sub(tokenBalanceLedger_[_customerAddress],_amountOfTokens)](vulnerable1.sol#L199)
	- [tokenBalanceLedger_[_toAddress] = SafeMath.add(tokenBalanceLedger_[_toAddress],_amountOfTokens)](vulnerable1.sol#L200)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Transfer(_customerAddress,_toAddress,_amountOfTokens)](vulnerable1.sol#L203)
